animeDescription: A comedy about a kind but slow-witted dragon who appears from a nearby volcanic eruption. People find Guzura quite charming and interesting as he can consume metal and change it into useful devices.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Sasagawa Hiroshi', ['Director', 'Episode Director', 'Original Creator']], ['Kinoshita Renzo', ['Episode Director']], ['Toriumi Jinzou', ['Script', 'Planning']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
